Ext. data. CclDirectProxy

A Ext store Proxy implementation that uses Ext.Direct (via PCRemotingProvider.js) to preform callbacks

Detail

Because Ext assumes that callbacks will be made against a URL post, params are defined by name instead of positionally as CCL scripts expect.

This class works around this by using a paramList config option to define the order that params should be processed in the embedded ccl_callback function.

Parameters

optionsoptions object, see below

Options

paramListA string array of parameter names in the order that the CCL expects them
directFna reference the direct Function that will execute this callback

Note

The data returned by the CCL_script is run through <mpages_jslib.js.fixCclJson> to clean up the output from CNVTRECTOJSON.

//A returned object like this:

{
    DATA:{
        DATA:[{
            MRN:"8621200",
            ACC:"00000XR20108000027",
            TYPE:"Chest 1 View",
            DATE_ORDERED:"2010-04-15 00:00:01",
            DATE_COMPLETED:"2010-04-15 00:00:01",
            STATUS:"Exam Completed"
        }],
        TOTALROWS:1
    }
}


//Will be converted to this


{
    data:[{
        mrn:"8621200",
        acc:"00000XR20108000027",
        type:"Chest 1 View",
        date_ordered:"2010-04-15 00:00:01",
        date_completed:"2010-04-15 00:00:01",
        status:"Exam Completed"
    }],
    totalrows:1
}

Example

load_mpage_ids();//create local user_id, person_id, and encounter_id variables

//in the grid definition
    ...
    xtype:"grid",
    stripeRows:true,
    ds:new Ext.data.Store({
        storeId:id,
        proxy: new Ext.data.CclProxy({
            paramList:["outdev","person_id"],
            directFn:API.pacs_url_get_acc
        }),
        autoLoad:true,
        reader: new Ext.data.JsonReader(
            {
                totalProperty: "totalrows",
                root: "data",
                id: "acc"
            },
            [
                "mrn",
                "acc",
                "type",
                {name:"valid_from", type:"date", dateFormat:"Y-m-d H:i:s"},
                {name:"event_end", type:"date", dateFormat:"Y-m-d H:i:s"},
                {name:"last_update", type:"date", dateFormat:"Y-m-d H:i:s"},
                "result"
            ]
        ),
        baseParams:{
            outdev:"MINE",
            person_id:person_id
        }
    }),
    ...
